1. Create Private key

```shell
openssl genrsa -out jane.key 2048
# jane.key

openssl req -new -key jane.key -subj "/CN=jane" -out jane.csr
# jane.csr

cat jane.csr
-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----
MIICVDCCATwCAQAwDzENMAsGA1UEAwwEamFuZTCCASIwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQEBBQAD
ggEPADCCAQoCggEBALHnhdCrHT6h8rqQqA4UF6scsxlSU0U4NvE1Q61s50xs8OOT
1MvK0NHZFRF/1JjAe4nMaIfTDZgk2fbLhvM+iAwfXiei25EIoBd5a8A3dhMhx79X
KPwSzdeDsSU0OhpeRooZfjsSl7+OHNaayf4ym+4t3HdtmvS4VtXr43VQ9I4f74Nn
DU5m6Q4xodBVZa8Nh0ZTuU17KoYJSS0hIv5iDVI85Cw16hykLtrZWExn+nuMkU3X
/Gg4B2qGPSjBUy8R7hq1OhQc/wqFyxifXZPd84fHU8z+6Y58fMy220nsX4m5wryR
N48ooD3Y4PJz3SfrJd2cqeYx3WFvyxyrSuYZlbMCAwEAAaAAMA0GCSqGSIb3DQEB
CwUAA4IBAQCWNDomficD/wzNSKLnN4ikzHXRKgXRvK34PMUO7OpTSPlKkc8Bz8WN
nyCICo3FK1RDhd/s1Knvjs4oTz+nTZBJZCwWU9kO/eEJvKCwL/mRnPkkCznwKZsq

JrmIrjFJVosPAGerb1AiZ5Hi8/853i+Y
-----END CERTIFICATE REQUEST-----

cat jane.csr | base64

```

```shell
k apply -f jane-csr.yaml
```

```yaml
---
apiVersion: certificates.k8s.io/v1
kind: CertificateSigninRequest
metadata:
  name: jane
spec:
  expirationSeconds: 600 # sec
  usage:
    - digital signature
    - key encipherment
    - server auth
  request: 
```

```shell
k get csr jane -o yaml

echo "LS0tLS...0tCg==" | base64 -D
```
